overview: Join the infamous Bikini Bandits in their first full-length animated feature film as they try to save Christmas from the evil Mr. G. You'll see a whole new kind of Christmas "tail" with zombie strippers, muscle cars, voodoo magic and heavy artillery. So exciting you'll drop a yule log! Featuring Tool#s Maynard James Keenan as Father Christmas!Music by The Misfits and A Perfect Circle! Also starring Schoolly D, Godfather of Gangsta Rap!
title: Bikini Bandits Save Christmas
